category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEEnableItemAsResourceInBOE
preference.preference_description: Enables comaparision of the Item or Part which do not have occurence type in Bill of Equipment(BOE) in the Manufacturing applications. Valid Values: *false: Accountability check will not compare the Item or Part as a resource assignment. *true: Accountability check will compare the Item or Part as a resource assignment.
